nodes.text: Do You Know What Your Children Are?

Do You Know What Your Children Are? was the sixth instalment of The Keeper's World, published in Pizzazz 6 in March 1978. The entire story arc was reprinted in the UK in Star Wars Weekly 47–50 in 1978–79, and in the 1999 limited-release comic Star Wars 0.

Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa, C-3PO, and R2-D2 escape Imperial stormtroopers by teleporting into the Keeper's Temple, where they are confronted by four mysterious children with the power to control the elements. Before they can question the children further, the stormtroopers manage to activate the teleportal and continue the chase.
The title of this comic is a play on the late night public service messages of the 1970's that asked the question, "Do you know where your children are?"
